name: The total payment amount per month in a borrower schedule should equal the value

children.description: Given details of "5000.00","5.0",'4' and "2018-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload
When user invoke rest service to generate Plan
Then validate borrowerPaymentAmount of each month should be equal except the last month which can differ

title: The total payment amount per month in a borrower schedule should equal the value

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given details of "<loanAmount>","<nominalRate>",'<duration>' and "<startDate>" to create generate Plan request payload
When user invoke rest service to generate Plan
Then validate borrowerPaymentAmount of each month should be equal except the last month which can differ
